job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for responsible, polite, and confident individuals to join our team as a Telemarketing and Telesales Executive. The responsibilities of this position include communicating with customers over the phone, providing information about products/services, and assisting in sales activities.

Responsibilities:
- Contacting potential and existing customers over the phone
- Presenting detailed information about products and services clearly and attractively
- Resolving customer inquiries and issues
- Following up with interested customers to complete sales
- Maintaining accurate records of calls and customer-related information
- Ensuring customer satisfaction through polite and professional behavior
- Coordinating with the team to achieve daily and monthly sales targets

Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Minimum Qualification: SSC Pass Preference will be given to candidates with experience in Telesales, Telemarketing, Product Sales, or Customer Support Ability to communicate clearly, effectively, and professionally Proficiency in computer skills (MS Word, MS Excel, Email, etc.) Mindset to work responsibly and diligently Fresh candidates are also encouraged to apply (training opportunities available for qualified candidates) Work Schedule Morning 10:00 AM - Evening 9:00 PM Lunch and prayer facilities available Workplace üìç House- 82/1, Road- 02, Block- A, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka- 1212 What We Offer Friendly and supportive work environment Training and learning opportunities Opportunity for long-term work and career development

Responsibilities: The Digital Sales team relies heavily on field-level freelancers for lead generation. To ensure the Acquisition team has a steady and sufficient lead pipeline for both Shops and Restaurants, we need your support for freelancer hiring for lead generation.

What are our current offerings for the freelancers?

To encourage active participation, we are providing rewards for each qualified lead:
- BDT 75 per qualified Restaurant lead
- BDT 60 per qualified Shop lead
- Payment disbursement: Processed by HR and released by the end of the next month

Qualifying Criteria:
- Leads must be new and not available in Salesforce.
- SKU Limit: 11 items
- All leads must be submitted through the Google Form.
- Leads must fall within existing delivery zones. Freelancers can verify coverage by checking the Bangladesh Delivery Map.

Support & Training:
- The Digital Sales team is willing to conduct short training sessions for freelancers on how to identify potential leads and how to submit them properly.

Responsibilities: - Call a specific number of customers every day.
- Regularly update information in the conversation tracking sheet with the customer.
- Provide correct and appropriate answers to customer questions.
- Establish and maintain a positive relationship with the customer.
- Achieve monthly sales targets.
- Actively participate in teamwork.

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities: - Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest.
- Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team.
- VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance.
- Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets.
- Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email.
- Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management.
- Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales.

Requirements: ```html Additional Requirements Age 22 to 28 years Communication Skills: Must have fluent communication skills in both Bangla & English with a clear and confident voice. Appearance: Must be smart, good-looking, and well-groomed/presentable (essential for interacting with high-profile clients). Attitude: Must be energetic, target-oriented, and hardworking. Flexibility: Must have the mentality to work extra hours occasionally outside of standard office time if required by the business or for urgent client meetings. Tech Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel), Email drafting, and WhatsApp communication is required. ```

Job Responsibilities: Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest. Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team. VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance. Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets. Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email. Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management. Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales.

Responsibilities: ```html Gate Control: Inspect every individual entering and exiting the warehouse. Do not allow unauthorized individuals inside. Document Check: Before any truck exits, make sure to verify the invoice (delivery note) and gate pass. Manual Counting / Tally: Count each package or carton manually while loading or unloading the truck. Weight Monitoring: Ensure to weigh each truck on the scale during entry and exit. Lock & Key: Securely lock all warehouse doors and shutters at the end of work and keep the key safe. Perimeter Patrol: Regularly patrol the perimeter fence and warehouse area to check for any suspicious activities. Fire Safety: Enforce a strict "No Smoking" policy inside the warehouse to prevent fire incidents. Labor Supervision: Supervise workers to ensure no goods are being hidden or stolen during busy loading times. Night Vigilance: Stay awake and alert during the night shift using torchlight and whistle. Reporting: Immediately inform the manager if any goods are lost, damaged, or if any issues occur. Benefits: Overtime ```
